Confidence intervals for
semipartial correlation coefficients
are generated using
the `SCorNB()` function from the `betaNB` package.
In this example,
we use the data set and the model used in
[betaNB: Example Using the BetaNB Function](example-beta-nb.html).


``` r
library(betaNB)
```




``` r
df <- betaNB::nas1982
```

### Regression

Fit the regression model using the `lm()` function.


``` r
object <- lm(QUALITY ~ NARTIC + PCTGRT + PCTSUPP, data = df)
```

### Nonparametric Bootstrap


``` r
nb <- NB(object)
```

### Semipartial Correlation Coefficients

#### Normal-Theory Approach


``` r
out <- SCorNB(nb, alpha = 0.05)
```

## Methods

### summary

Summary of the results of `SCorNB()`.

#### Percentile Confidence Intervals


``` r
summary(out, type = "pc")
#> Call:
#> SCorNB(object = nb, alpha = 0.05)
#> 
#> Semipartial correlations
#> type = "pc"
#>            est     se    R   2.5%  97.5%
#> NARTIC  0.4312 0.0690 5000 0.2845 0.5558
#> PCTGRT  0.3430 0.0731 5000 0.1888 0.4781
#> PCTSUPP 0.2385 0.0717 5000 0.0951 0.3716
```

#### Bias Corrected Confidence Intervals


``` r
summary(out, type = "bc")
#> Call:
#> SCorNB(object = nb, alpha = 0.05)
#> 
#> Semipartial correlations
#> type = "bc"
#>            est     se    R   2.5%  97.5%
#> NARTIC  0.4312 0.0690 5000 0.3051 0.5780
#> PCTGRT  0.3430 0.0731 5000 0.2152 0.5045
#> PCTSUPP 0.2385 0.0717 5000 0.1073 0.3811
```

#### Bias Corrected and Accelerated Confidence Intervals


``` r
summary(out, type = "bca")
#> Call:
#> SCorNB(object = nb, alpha = 0.05)
#> 
#> Semipartial correlations
#> type = "bca"
#>            est     se    R   2.5%  97.5%
#> NARTIC  0.4312 0.0690 5000 0.3106 0.5851
#> PCTGRT  0.3430 0.0731 5000 0.2254 0.5184
#> PCTSUPP 0.2385 0.0717 5000 0.1037 0.3777
```

### coef

Return the vector of estimates.


``` r
coef(out)
#>    NARTIC    PCTGRT   PCTSUPP 
#> 0.4311525 0.3430075 0.2384789
```

### vcov

Return the sampling covariance matrix.


``` r
vcov(out)
#>                NARTIC        PCTGRT       PCTSUPP
#> NARTIC   0.0047675934 -0.0004048326 -0.0006692601
#> PCTGRT  -0.0004048326  0.0053466769 -0.0008599189
#> PCTSUPP -0.0006692601 -0.0008599189  0.0051480038
```

### confint

Return confidence intervals.

#### Percentile Confidence Intervals


``` r
confint(out, level = 0.95, type = "pc")
#>              2.5 %    97.5 %
#> NARTIC  0.28446210 0.5557859
#> PCTGRT  0.18882005 0.4781408
#> PCTSUPP 0.09507497 0.3715596
```

#### Bias Corrected Confidence Intervals


``` r
confint(out, level = 0.95, type = "bc")
#>             2.5 %    97.5 %
#> NARTIC  0.3051102 0.5780349
#> PCTGRT  0.2152062 0.5045248
#> PCTSUPP 0.1073155 0.3810926
```

#### Bias Corrected and Accelerated Confidence Intervals


``` r
confint(out, level = 0.95, type = "bca")
#>             2.5 %    97.5 %
#> NARTIC  0.3106368 0.5850799
#> PCTGRT  0.2254425 0.5183805
#> PCTSUPP 0.1036841 0.3777370
```
